name: Propertalis
slogan: We help property owners sell, let or manage their property with a freelance estate agent
description: Our platform helps London property owners hire a highly skilled and motivated freelance estate agent to sell, let or manage their property. It also supports them throughout the sales or letting process, simplifying the tasks and keeping them informed every step of the way.

team.name: Edmond Ibrahimi
team.bioHtml: European Real Estate | Investment Management | Raising Capital  | Due Diligence | Compliance |  Financial Markets

team.name: Maarten de Vries
team.bioHtml: Product Manager @Propertalis • Background in sales and strategy at @SAP

jobs.title: Growth Marketer & Co-Founder Proptech
jobs.description:
We are looking for a Growth Marketer and Co-Funder who really understands all the moving pieces of modern web marketing, loves the transformations that tech is bringing in many aspects of our lives and wants to play an active role in disrupting property business. 

**About Propertalis**

We’re preparing to launch a business and platform to connect London property owners directly with highly skilled and motivated freelance estate agents. 
 
High Street and online agencies are all good at marketing and sales, but the quality of their service is variable and it’s hard for consumers to tell the good from the bad until it’s too late. We believe many agencies don’t pay their agents enough to attract and retain the best talent and don’t incentivise them to get the best results for their clients. People are basically entrusting their most valuable asset to a somewhat unskilled and unmotivated agent.
 
We believe the most experienced and skilled agents should go freelance. They will be highly motivated by the prospect of earning all of their client’s commission. Clients can choose exactly who they want to work with. They can get excellent service and results, without paying any more than they would on the High Street. 
 
Our platform helps clients hire the right freelance agent to sell, let or manage their property. It also uses technology to support the wholesales or letting process, simplifying tasks and keeping them both fully informed every step of the way. 
 
The two current co-founders are both working full-time on this opportunity, although one of them also runs a successful property management business. Their backgrounds are in real estate, law, software, sales and product management. But we’re both generalists, who are incredibly energised by the potential of this business. 
 

* About the Opportunity*

The position is about marketing our services and brand. You will help our business scale by applying your marketing skills to support the growth process. You will work together with our Sales team so they can reach out to new leads which you helped to generate.

This is a start up so the list of duties and responsibilities will be very dynamic based on actual needs but these are the most important aspects you’ll be working on:

Creating and applying a Growth Strategy 
Preparing and managing  campaigns
Managing and Creating Content (web,letters, blog, posters, brochures, etc.)
Managing and Creating CTA's
Writing, sending and analysing emails 
Managing and creating gated content
Grow and manage social networks accounts
Create a community of techie property owners
Play an active commentator role on property topics all around the internet.

Part of recruiting will be a test of your skills that will demand a couple of days of your time, do not apply if you are not willing to do that. 

*What We’re Looking For*

We’re looking for someone with experience in growth marketing and startups.  Chemistry is a big thing for us, so we’re looking for someone who is passionate about Proptech and really shares our vision. We are also looking for someone who: 
 
has been successful before on doing this role in a startup preferably.
is ‘hungry’ for a big change in her life and wants to make an impact. 
is DO_ER, ideas and discussions are useless without execution.  
 
 
To Apply 
 
If you’ve made it this far and are still interested in working with us, then we want to hear from you. Please send us a copy of your CV and a brief explanation of your motivation. We look forward to hearing from you.

jobs.title: Senior Estate Agent as Co-founder of Proptech
jobs.description:
Senior London residential estate agent needed for a purpose-driven company that wants to use freelancers and Proptech to transform the industry. 


About Propertalis

We’re preparing to launch a business and platform to connect London property owners directly with highly skilled and motivated freelance estate agents. 

High Street and online agencies are all good at marketing and sales, but the quality of their service is variable and it’s hard for consumers to tell the good from the bad until it’s too late. We believe many agencies don’t pay their agents enough to attract and retain the best talent and don’t incentivise them to get the best results for their clients. People are basically entrusting their most valuable asset to a somewhat unskilled and unmotivated agent!

We believe that the agents with the skill, will and attitude to succeed will soon go freelance in the UK, just like they have already done in Australia, the US and elsewhere. Freelance agents earn nearly all their client's commission, so they are naturally eager to please! Clients can choose exactly who they want to work with and get excellent service and results, without necessarily paying any more than they would on the High Street. 

Our platform helps clients hire the right freelance agent to sell, let or manage their property. It also uses technology to support the entire sales or letting process, simplifying tasks and keeping them both fully informed every step of the way. 

The two current co-founders are both working full-time on this opportunity, although one of them also runs a successful property management business. Their backgrounds are in real estate, law, software, sales and product management. But we’re both generalists, who are incredibly energised by the potential of this business. 
 

About the Opportunity

We are looking for a senior estate agent to join us as a third co-founder and partner in the business. 

We are a new business with a new product, so we need a hunter, not a farmer. Someone who's not afraid to get out there and personally find our first customers and close the first deals. Someone who can lead by example and show others how it's done, because you'll be recruiting, training and coaching them in your image!

Remember, these first customers will be early adopters. We only need a few, but we need those who love what we're doing and are willing to give us a try, so we can validate our business model. Your first task is to find them, win their business and delight them with amazing results, so they tell their friends!

As soon as we're up and running, your co-founder role will quickly evolve from super-agent to director. You'll be recruiting, training and coaching freelance agents to follow in your footsteps. Together, we'll build the marketing machine to acquire more customers at lower cost. We'll find key partners in the London property, Proptech and investor community. And we'll quickly secure funding to expand to the rest of London and beyond. 

Your package will be a mix of salary, commission and equity, depending on your profile and preference. It may be below your market value to begin with - that is your investment as an entrepreneur - but it will grow considerably as soon as we secure funding. You'll be rewarded for your efforts, but your main driver should be a burning passion to be the disruptor of your own industry!
 

To Apply 

If you've made it this far and you recognise yourself in the above, we want to hear from you! Please send us your CV and a brief explanation of your motivation. We look forward to hearing from you!
